58195.「キサマが どうぐ使いとして\n どこまで成長したか 見たくなったのだ。\n ち:
I am... curious to see if you have attained any significant growth in your skill as an Item Master.
Only slightly curious, mind you.

58196.「とにかく 天才魔道学者である ワガハイが\n 直々に 特訓をつけてやるのだから:
But never mind that. You're receiving personal training from one of the most brilliant minds in this world, so you
better feel grateful! Fuahahaha!

58197.「よし。では 始めるとしよう。\n まずは マスターキーを………:
Now. Let us begin. First, we need the Master
Key...

58198.「うん……？ あれは なんだ……？: Hmmm? What is that awful buzzing overhead?

58199.「クククク……。これはこれは\n デルクロア研究員ではないか。:
Well, well, well. If it isn't Researcher
Delcroix.

58200.「ぬぬぬぬ……。\n キサマは 地上制圧隊の偵察兵か？\n こんなにも早く 見つ:
Hmmmm...reconnaissance units from the
Ground Patrol? I can't believe you already
found me.

58201.「言わなくとも わかっておるぞ。\n ワガハイを 魔界に連れ戻す気だろう？:
There's no need to squawk off, I already know
your purpose. You're here to escort me back
to the Demon World, yes?

58202.「その通りだ。我々に 逆らったら\n どうなるかは キサマも知っているはずだ。\:
If you know that, you know what'll happen
if you defy us. So how's about you come
back to the Demon World with us, alright?

58203.「バカめ。答えは ノーだ。: You idiot. The answer is no.

58204.「なに……？ キサマ 今 なんと言った？: Come again? What was that just now?

58205.「ふははは！ ノーと 言ったのだ！\n 天才であるワガハイは 誰にも束縛されん！:
Fuahaha! I said NO. My genius mind is bound
by no one! There's no way I'd return to the
Demon World with the likes of you!

58206.「研究員の分際で いい気になりおって！\n ならば チカラずくで 連れ戻すまでだ:
You're awfully cocky for a mere researcher!
Then we'll just have to bring you and this
"genius mind" of yours back by force!

58207.「ふははは！ キサマら偵察兵ごとき\n この ワガハイが 相手をするまでもないわ:
Fuhahaha! Simple scouts like you aren't
even worthy of my attention. I won't be
lifting a single finger to deal with you.

58209.「せっかく 逃げおおせたのに\n また ここに戻ってくるとは おろかだな！\n:
You managed to get away once, and yet you're
back for more? You're real stupid for a
so-called genius, Delcroix!

58210.「ぬぬぬ……。まだ この辺りにいたとは\n ワガハイとしたことが ぬかったわ。\:
Hmmmm...I didn't think you'd still be
hanging around here. You've got me completely
surrounded.

58211.「ふははは！ よいところに来た 原住民よ！\n 特訓は ひとまず おあずけにして:
Fuhahaha! The Astoltian arrives, right on
schedule. But your special training is
on hold until you defeat these monsters!

59108.「ま まさか 地上制圧隊の偵察兵を\n 倒してしまうとは……。:
To think that someone like you could
actually defeat those Ground Patrol Scouts...

59109.「ふははは！ ワガハイが生み出した\n どうぐ使いなら 勝って当然と言えよう！:
Fuahahaha! But of course the Item Master
I created would achieve victory!

59110.「まあ この戦いで キサマの実力の程は\n よくわかったからな。\n 今回の特訓:
I've come to understand just what you're
capable of by watching you in battle. Consider
your special training over for now.

59111.「アストルティアのサルが\n 魔物を 従えているとはな……。:
Astoltian monkeys leading monsters into
battle... how unexpected.

59112.「どうぐ使い <cs_pchero>！\n キサマの名前は 覚えたぞ！:
Item Master <cs_pchero>!
I'll remember that name.

59113.「デルクロア研究員よ 覚悟しておけ！\n アストルティアのサルと 組んでいること:
As for you, Delcroixーprepare yourself.
I'm sending a report to headquarters telling
them you've allied with the Astoltians!

59114.「ぬぬぬぬ……。なんてことだ。\n 生き残りがいたとは 気づかなかった……。:
Hmmmmmm...what a terrible twist. To think
that there was one still alive...

59115.「ああ……いったい どうすれば……。\n まずい まずい まずい……。\n この:
Oh...what should I do? This is bad, bad,
bad... If this keeps up, then HE will show
up...

59116.「ふ……ふははは！ 何を見ておる！\n これぐらいは 計算通りである！\n 奴が:
Fu, fuhahaha! What are you staring at?
This is exactly as I anticipated! I knew
that there'd be one left to go make a report.

59117.「さあ！ ボケっと 突っ立っておるでない！\n ワガハイの研究室に戻るぞ！ 原住:
Now then! Don't just stand there like an
idiot. We are returning to my laboratory at
once!

59118.「ふははは！ どうやら ワガハイの過去が\n 気になって 気になって 仕方ないよ:
Fuahaha! I can tell that you're just burning
with curiosity to hear all about my past.
Very well, as a reward I shall indulge you.

59119.「魔界にいた頃のワガハイは さる大貴族に\n 飼われている 地上制圧隊の指揮下に:
During my time in the Demon World, I worked as a member of a research and development unit under the command of the Ground
Patrol, funded by a certain nobleman.

59120.「その 研究開発室での仕事というのは\n チカラだけが取り柄の 地上制圧隊の魔物:
The work in that facility involved enhancing
the monsters of the Ground Patrol unit,
who relied solely on their strength.

59121.「だが 最初から強い魔物を 強くするなど……\n そんな研究が おもしろかろうハ:
It was research conducted to make the strong
even stronger... I found it terribly boring.

59122.「ワガハイは 自分の好きな研究に没頭するため\n 魔界に見切りをつけ アストルテ:
So I decided to leave the Demon World behind,
and came here to Astoltia to indulge in the
research I love. And that is my story.

59123.「アストルティアの原住民に\n ワガハイが 過去のことを話すなど\n 滅多に な:
Sharing my past with an Astoltian is a truly
rare occurrence. You should be grateful.

59124.「……偵察兵を 取り逃がしたとなると \n 遠からず 地上制圧隊 本隊からの追っ:
Thinthe that thcout wath able to ethcape,
it'th probably juth a matter of time before
the reth of the Ground Patrol thowth up.

59125.「きっと その追っ手を <pc>さんに\n 追い払ってもらうため ご主人さまは\:
I'm thure Mathter told you hith thtory tho
you'd help drive hith purthuerth away,
<pc>.

59126.「いつ 追っ手が来てもいいように修行して\n 準備ができたら また どうぐ使いに:
You thould prepare yourthelf and come back
here ath an Item Mathter, onth you are ready.
